title: Default value in list box of report parameter lost after modifying the default value
description: When modifying the default value in a list box of a report parameter, the default value is lost. This issue needs to be addressed for proper functionality.
OB: The default value in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: The expected behavior is that when modifying the default value of a list box in a report parameter, the newly set default value should be retained and used as intended.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Go to the list box default value settings.
3. Modify the default value to a new value.
4. Save the changes.
5. Reopen the report parameter settings and check if the modified default value is retained.
